text: yara tadera dharmake grahana karechila khela o kautukarupe, ara e'i duniyara jibana yadera bhuliyechila.â€™â€™ Sutaram aja amara tadera parityaga karechi yemana tara abahela karechila tadera e'i dinatira sange milita ha'oyara byapare, ara yehetu tara amadera nirdesabali pratyakhyana karechila.
